description: Once BLZ files have been transferred to the mobile phone, they may be installed using the BLZ Installer application, which can be uploaded and installed on a Nokia phone. BLZ files may also be extracted on your PC using the BLZ Extractor utility.
N-Gage games are also distributed using the .N-GAGE file extension.
NOTE: BLZ files are sometimes uploaded to other Symbian OS-based mobile devices to play games. However, this process is unofficial and is not supported by Nokia.
